short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Solvr: Solve questions effortlessly with AI. Capture, type, or right-click to get instant answers without leaving your page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🚀 Solve your questions in seconds with Solvr, the ultimate Chrome extension that delivers answers without needing extra tabs or copy-pasting. Whether you're a student, researcher, or just curious, Solvr is here to help – and it's completely free! 🙌

✨ Three powerful features to make your life easier:

🔍 Solve with Solvr: Highlight any text on a webpage, right-click, and choose "Solve with Solvr" to get the answer instantly, no typing required.

📸 Capture & Solvr: Take a screenshot of any question on your screen, and Solvr will provide the solution in seconds – no need to type!

✍️ Text & Solvr: Prefer typing? Just enter your question, and Solvr will give you the answer right in your browser – no extra tabs needed.

Say goodbye to juggling multiple tabs, endless searches, and manual copy-pasting. With Solvr, answers are always just a click (or screenshot) away! 🚀💡
